name: Invisible in the dark game
description:
Hello, everyone! 

This short atmospheric game was made with inspiration of Weekly Game Jam 147 theme - Invisible. Pixel art, level design, programming by Arkhey.  

Powered by Unreal Engine 4.

Music made by YesPolicePlease 

VK: https://bit.ly/2WrlskU

YouTube: https://bit.ly/3b4XRf8

SoundCloud: https://bit.ly/2ykYwfa

BandCamp: https://bit.ly/2Wv71vT

If you like the prototype, made by 3 days from scratch, please follow me to become a part of our future great projects. 

Thanks for playing. Arkhey
